topComments.author: Mohamed Soliman
topComments.comment: (TraduÃ§Ã£o do Google) O Grande Museu EgÃ­pcio Ã© o maior museu do mundo dedicado a uma Ãºnica civilizaÃ§Ã£o. A coleÃ§Ã£o composta pelo tÃºmulo do rei Tut e dezenas de milhares de outros achados arqueolÃ³gicos raros e Ãºnicos encontrou um novo lar em um museu construÃ­do no planalto das pirÃ¢mides de GizÃ©. Este edifÃ­cio altamente complexo e de difÃ­cil construÃ§Ã£o tem a assinatura do BESIX e da Orascom e espera-se que se torne um centro de cultura e educaÃ§Ã£o, incentivando o entusiasmo pela histÃ³ria do Egito.  (Original) The Grand Egyptian Museum is the world's largest museum dedicated to a single civilization. The collection consisting of King Tut's tomb and tens of thousands of other rare and unique archaeological finds has found a new home in a museum built on the plateau of the pyramids of Giza. This highly complex and difficult-to-construct building bears the signature of BESIX and Orascom and is expected to become a centre for culture and education, encouraging enthusiasm about Egypt's hystory.
